Job Description: We have built a successful Oracle Practice which provides consultancy, development and support services to a range of Irish and International organisations. This is a great opportunity to progress existing Oracle skills with a leading Oracle Platinum Partner with excellent career prospects, and there will be opportunities for cross-practice work as well as a pipeline of complex and innovative projects to support.     Qualifications        A degree or masters degree in Information Systems, Computer Science or a related discipline. (industry certification and significant work experience will be considered)   A minimum 5 years experience developing applications using Oracle PLSQL, SQL*Loader, Forms & Reports   Delivery experience of Oracle solutions within the software industry, with a solid understanding of the software developmentdeployment lifecycle, particularly with regard to the bespoke implementation of systems using Oracle data warehouses, PLSQL and Forms.   Solid understanding of ETL processes.   Solid understanding of code version management and code promotion practices in an enterprise environment.   Excellent communications (written and oral), interpersonal, analytical and organisational skills and proficiency with MS Office.
